attributes.title: Chemistry Of The Pralaya-Deluge || Nithya Satsang || Retelecast || 20 July 2020
attributes.description:
TITLE: Chemistry Of The Pralaya-Deluge
Name Of The Program: Nithya Satsang with HDH Nithyananda Paramashivam
Date: 20 July 2020

Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Jagatguru Mahasannidhanam His Divine Holiness Bhagavan #Nithyananda Paramashivam explains what is the chemistry happening in the Cosmos for this Pralaya to start, get initiated And what is the chemistry it is manifesting in all of us. What is the alchemy process to save ourself from this Pralaya, deluge, pandemic, eco pandemic, Pandemic Fatigue and all the effects of pandemic. 
HDH explains knowing the chemistry of this Pralaya, you can protect yourself from this Pralaya. Pralaya, is delusion. What usually delusion does to your system is the chemistry. How this delusion impacts your inner chemistry ? The first impact of delusion will be extreme mood swings, feeling disconnected even with the purpose of your existence and life. 
HDH Shares, That is why I am insisting this till December 14th, bring more and more love, joy, Completion, Unclutching. Take my words very seriously. Every word I am uttering is really, really, uttered with extreme sincerity. Unclutching, completion, not sleeping more than six hours; all these are too important for you to keep yourself together at least till December, till December 14th. Extreme violence inside-outside, murderous, suicidal, will be the normal flow due to this Pralaya. 
Due to this Pralaya, deluge - your past violence, karmas, everything will be triggered from the source. It is also good news if you can use this opportunity to complete with all the unknown incompletions which will now gush out, which will now ooze out due to this deluge. When there is a collective deluge, Pralaya, even the deepest layers of your patterns, incompletions, all will ooze out. So, if you practice Absolute Completion, Non-Violence, non-reaction, no response internally, externally for all the incompletions, patterns coming out, erupting out, gushing out, oozing out; if you go for UNCLUTCHING this Pralaya, this pandemic time will give you SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH, Enlightenment, Powers; and not only you will sail through this pandemic, Pralaya; you will give a Superconscious Breakthrough to others by setting a trend.

The Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism Jagatguru Mahasannidhanam His Divine Holiness Nithyananda Paramashivam (HDH) is the reviver of KAILASA - the ancient enlightened civilization and the great cosmic borderless Hindu nation. Revered as the incarnation of Paramashiva - the primordial Hindu Divinity, HDH has a following of 2 billion Hindus worldwide with de facto spiritual embassies in over 150 countries. He has worked untiringly for over 26 years for the revival of Kailasa, for global peace and to give super conscious breakthrough to humanity. He has survived the worst persecution of multiple assassination attempts on person and on character by anti-Hindu elements. He is collecting, organising, preserving, time capsuling, decoding, spreading and reviving 20 Million source books of Hinduism and the 64 sacred arts & sciences like Ayurveda, music, dance, sculpting, astrology, vastu and much more. Close to 20,000 hours of HDHâ€™s timeless talks have been recorded till date (Sep 2020), which are a treasure trove of powerful cognitions to solve individual and global problems of any kind.
